channel.title: [pi] DarkClawz Castle wars pyramid plunder added drop party Christmas event
channel.description:
[b]Hey guys another project i am doing with a friend hope you like[/b] originalpkz@hotmail.co.uk
[code]Update 15th December added Christmas event Update 14th December added ::snowon and ::snowoff just for xmas Update 11th December added drop party Update date 10th December 100% horse game added update date 9th december moved shops around update date 8th December part 1 off the quest done New summoning interfaces added summoning helps you fight other npc and players - in multi zone change home & fix it up working on summoning fixed some bugs update date 24th September dice bag was added added new skill tab added new magic tab clipped following donatorzone update date 28th September added new emote icons updated quest tab added some portals at home[/code]
Green: Works 95%-100% Orange: Started Red:Doesn't Work and Havent Started
[b][size=12pt]Skills[/size][/b] Attack Strength Defence Ranged Prayer Magic Constitution Mining Smithing Crafting Fishing Cookin Woodcutting Firemaking Slayer Agility RuneCrafting Farming herblore summoning Dungeoneering Hunter Construction
Christmas event added thanks to my mate :D [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture242.png[/img] When you complete the quest you get a reward and this pops up [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture243.png[/img]
added drop party room didnt use a tutorial [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture239.png[/img]
thats what the horse says when you click on them [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture238.png[/img]
update prat 1 off the quest done this is just some off the pictures off the dialog off the quest
[img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture234.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture235.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture236.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture226.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture228.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture229-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture230-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture227.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture231.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture233.png[/img] [b]just for xmas[/b] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture240.png[/img] much more coming soon

item.title: [pi] DarkClawz Castle wars pyramid plunder added drop party Christmas event
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:39, topic:424564”][quote author=liamp link=topic=527221.msg3842451#msg3842451 date=1323363144]
Update 14th December
added ::snowon and ::snowoff just for xmas
[/quote]

I’m pretty sure i released a tutorial on that yesterday, In fact. I’m pretty sure i’ve seen tutorials for like 90% of your updates…[/quote]party room was leaked by pk2play … but um yeah the leak hasn’t been out for a while.and there is nothing wrong with using a tutorial it just means that they found the contribution actually worth it. Even though me at least 80% of the time I will rewrite it if its messy or i feel it could use improvements.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] DarkClawz Castle wars pyramid plunder added drop party Christmas event
item.dc:creator: @Meeper1 Meeper.
item.description:
@Meeper1 wrote:

I like the idea, but it looks kinda sloppy to me such as the dialogue, and then summoning for any pi has bugs that i don’t want to get into detail with. I do LOVE how you added fireworks when you level, but you need too add two or three.

Read full topic
